_sText:
Mg_dodgeball_b5
Map creator: Olli3
..........................
SPECIAL THANKS:
Mariusz - For giving me the game for my birthday
_________________________________________________
OBJECTIVE:
You have 2 hp left after falling, you must hit you're enemies with smoke grenades until you kill them!
Each player can take 2 hits from smoke grenades, so be sure to watch where you're going!

After 2 minutes, all four sides will be teleported to a knife arena. There it is simple,
Knife you're enemies!

Now, You're probably thinking "Wait! This is unfair!", Well. Its not. The point is
to kill the people that are good at knifing, so you can kill the people that are not
as good at knifing, so you're team will win
_________________________________________________

Notes:
This is BETA 5 of mg_dodgeball. There will be many fixes
________________________________________________
CHANGE LOG:
-Added a maze to get to a bunch of guns.
-Instead of having a HUGE basket of smoke grenades, there is a spawner.
-Changed the knife arena a bit, to make it easier to ambush.
_______________________________________________
Please Report glitches to my FPS Banana account...

ENJOY THE MAP,
Olli3
